page.title: 02Employment.
page.content: Dufftown 3 main areas of employment. Glenfiddich Distillery employs a large majority of the populaton because they not only have the distillery but also the bottling plant. Similarily the other 5 distilleries employ,between them, a fair ratio . However,the 3 DCL distilleries: Glen_ dullan,Mortlach and Convalmore have had their operations scaled down in the last year and hence have had to make some workers redundant. The other main employer in the area is J Walker and sons of Aberlour _the makers of shortbread and biscuits. There is limited employment in the village as many of the businesses are family run.
